body_html: I can not run word2vec_basic.py by command : python word2vec_basic.py It shows that the script can not download data, connection time out Traceback (most recent call last): File "word2vec_basic.py", line 49, in <module> filename = maybe_download('text8.zip', 31344016) File "word2vec_basic.py", line 39, in maybe_download filename, _ = urllib.request.urlretrieve(url + filename, filename) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/urllib.py", line 98, in urlretrieve return opener.retrieve(url, filename, reporthook, data) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/urllib.py", line 245, in retrieve fp = self.open(url, data) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/urllib.py", line 213, in open return getattr(self, name)(url) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/urllib.py", line 350, in open_http h.endheaders(data) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 1053, in endheaders self._send_output(message_body) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 897, in _send_output self.send(msg) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 859, in send self.connect() File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 836, in connect self.timeout, self.source_address) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/socket.py", line 575, in create_connection raise err IOError: [Errno socket error] [Errno 110] Connection timed out how can I fix it?
body_text: I can not run  word2vec_basic.py by command :  python  word2vec_basic.py   It shows that the script can not download data, connection time out Traceback (most recent call last): File "word2vec_basic.py", line 49, in <module> filename = maybe_download('text8.zip', 31344016) File "word2vec_basic.py", line 39, in maybe_download filename, _ = urllib.request.urlretrieve(url + filename, filename) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/urllib.py", line 98, in urlretrieve return opener.retrieve(url, filename, reporthook, data) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/urllib.py", line 245, in retrieve fp = self.open(url, data) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/urllib.py", line 213, in open return getattr(self, name)(url) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/urllib.py", line 350, in open_http h.endheaders(data) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 1053, in endheaders self._send_output(message_body) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 897, in _send_output self.send(msg) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 859, in send self.connect() File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 836, in connect self.timeout, self.source_address) File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/socket.py", line 575, in create_connection raise err IOError: [Errno socket error] [Errno 110] Connection timed out  how can I fix it?
body:
I can not run  word2vec_basic.py by command :  `python  word2vec_basic.py  ` It shows that the script can not download data, connection time out `Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "word2vec_basic.py", line 49, in <module>
    filename = maybe_download('text8.zip', 31344016)
  File "word2vec_basic.py", line 39, in maybe_download
    filename, _ = urllib.request.urlretrieve(url + filename, filename)
  File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/urllib.py", line 98, in urlretrieve
    return opener.retrieve(url, filename, reporthook, data)
  File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/urllib.py", line 245, in retrieve
    fp = self.open(url, data)
  File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/urllib.py", line 213, in open
    return getattr(self, name)(url)
  File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/urllib.py", line 350, in open_http
    h.endheaders(data)
  File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 1053, in endheaders
    self._send_output(message_body)
  File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 897, in _send_output
    self.send(msg)
  File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 859, in send
    self.connect()
  File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 836, in connect
    self.timeout, self.source_address)
  File "/home/deepinsight/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/socket.py", line 575, in create_connection
    raise err
IOError: [Errno socket error] [Errno 110] Connection timed out`  how can I fix it?
